name: github-deploy-lambda
description: Serverless function to deploy GitHub repo when invoked as webhook from GitHub

scripts.deploy: git submodule init && git submodule update --depth 1 && unzip -u -o -q git-lambda-layer/lambda2/layer.zip -d .git-layer && sh ./fix-layer-link.sh && serverless deploy
scripts.deploy-docker:macos: docker build -t deploy1 . && docker run -ti -v $HOME/.aws:/tmp/home/.aws:ro deploy1

author: Ruslan Gainutdinov
